languages.text: "Иногда первая же манифестация псайкера приводит к его собственной гибели и многочисленным жертвам. Если же псайкер наделен изрядной волей и дисциплиной, он может отсрочить свое падение. Идира жива уже много лет — похвальное достижение и невероятная удача, однако силы варпа неизбежно пожирают псайкера, лишенного защиты Императора. Нарастающие по силе манифестации — верный признак того, что финал близок".

traits.locale_text: "Иногда первая же манифестация псайкера приводит к его собственной гибели и многочисленным жертвам. Если же псайкер наделен изрядной волей и дисциплиной, он может отсрочить свое падение. Идира жива уже много лет — похвальное достижение и невероятная удача, однако силы варпа неизбежно точат несанкционированного псайкера изнутри. Нарастающие по силе манифестации — верный признак того, что твой ручной псайкер близок к своему финальному эпизоду, Вольный Торговец".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Sometimes a psyker's first manifestation leads to their death and the deaths of many others. But if a psyker possesses inordinate willpower and discipline, they can stave off their fall for some time. Idira has been alive many years already — a laudable achievement and a stroke of incredibly good fortune — but the forces of the warp will ultimately devour any psyker deprived of the Emperor's protection. The fact that these manifestations are growing more powerful is a clear sign that the end is near."
languages.original_text: "Иногда первая же манифестация псайкера приводит к его собственной гибели и многочисленным жертвам. Если же псайкер наделен изрядной волей и дисциплиной, он может отсрочить свое падение. Идира жива уже много лет — похвальное достижение и невероятная удача, однако силы варпа неизбежно пожирают псайкера, лишенного защиты Императора. Нарастающие по силе манифестации — верный признак того, что финал близок".

Indira has been alive many years already — a laudable achievement and a stroke of incredibly good fortune — but the forces of the warp will ultimately devour any psyker deprived of the Emperor's protection. The fact that these manifestations are growing more powerful is a clear sign that the end is near."

But if a psyker possesses inordinate willpower and discipline, they can stave off their fall for some time. Idira has been alive many years already — a laudable achievement and a stroke of incredibly good fortune — but the forces of the warp will ultimately devour any psyker deprived of the Emperor's protection. The fact that these manifestations are growing more powerful is a clear sign that the end is near."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “有的时候，灵能者第一次力量爆发，就会导致他们自己的死亡，也会导致许多其他人丧命。不过，如果灵能者拥有极为强大的意志力与纪律性，他们便可以在很长一段时间之内抵抗堕落的影响。伊迪拉已经活了很多年，这是个值得称赞的成就，也说明她有着难以置信的好运。然而，亚空间的力量，最终会吞噬每一位不受帝皇保护的灵能者。力量的爆发越来越猛烈便是个明显的迹象，预示灵能者的末日即将到来。”
languages.original_text: "Sometimes a psyker's first manifestation leads to their death and the deaths of many others. But if a psyker possesses inordinate willpower and discipline, they can stave off their fall for some time. Idira has been alive many years already — a laudable achievement and a stroke of incredibly good fortune — but the forces of the warp will ultimately devour any psyker deprived of the Emperor's protection. The fact that these manifestations are growing more powerful is a clear sign that the end is near."

traits.locale_text: “有的时候，灵能者第一次力量爆发，就会导致他们自己的死亡，也会导致许多其他人丧命。不过，如果灵能者拥有极为强大的意志力与纪律性，他们便可以在很长一段时间之内抵抗堕落的影响。伊迪拉已经活了很多年，这是个值得称赞的成就，也说明她有着难以置信的好运。然而，亚空间的力量，最终会吞噬每一位不受帝皇保护的灵能者。力量的爆发越来越猛烈便是个明显的迹象，预示灵能者的末日即将到来。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «En ocasiones, la primera manifestación de un psíquico causa su muerte y las de muchos otros. No obstante, si cuenta con una voluntad y disciplina de acero, puede retrasar su caída durante un tiempo. Idira ya ha vivido muchos años, lo que es tanto un logro encomiable como un gran golpe de suerte, pero las fuerzas de la disformidad acaban por devorar inevitablemente a todos los psíquicos carentes de la protección del Emperador. El poder de estas manifestaciones es una señal clara de que se acerca su fin».
languages.original_text: "Sometimes a psyker's first manifestation leads to their death and the deaths of many others. But if a psyker possesses inordinate willpower and discipline, they can stave off their fall for some time. Idira has been alive many years already — a laudable achievement and a stroke of incredibly good fortune — but the forces of the warp will ultimately devour any psyker deprived of the Emperor's protection. The fact that these manifestations are growing more powerful is a clear sign that the end is near."

traits.locale_text: «En ocasiones, la primera manifestación de un psíquico causa su muerte y las de muchos otros. No obstante, si cuenta con una voluntad y disciplina de acero, puede retrasar su caída durante un tiempo. Idira ya ha vivido muchos años, lo que es tanto un logro encomiable como un gran golpe de suerte, pero las fuerzas de la disformidad acaban por devorar inevitablemente a todos los psíquicos carentes de la protección del Emperador. El poder de estas manifestaciones es una señal clara de que se acerca su fin».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「異能者の初めての発現が、自分自身や他の多くの人々の死につながることもあります。ですが、異能者が並外れた意志力と規律を持っていれば、しばらくの間は失墜を食い止めることができる。イディラさんはすでに何年も生きています。それは称賛に値する業績であり、信じられないほどの幸運だ。ですが、皇帝の保護を失った異能者は、最終的に歪みの力にむしばまれることになるのです。これらの現象がより強力になっているという事実は、終わりが近いということの明白な兆しでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Sometimes a psyker's first manifestation leads to their death and the deaths of many others. But if a psyker possesses inordinate willpower and discipline, they can stave off their fall for some time. Idira has been alive many years already — a laudable achievement and a stroke of incredibly good fortune — but the forces of the warp will ultimately devour any psyker deprived of the Emperor's protection. The fact that these manifestations are growing more powerful is a clear sign that the end is near."

traits.locale_text: 「異能者の初めての発現が、自分自身や他の多くの人々の死につながることもあります。ですが、異能者が並外れた意志力と規律を持っていれば、しばらくの間は失墜を食い止めることができる。イディラさんはすでに何年も生きています。それは称賛に値する業績であり、信じられないほどの幸運だ。ですが、皇帝の保護を失った異能者は、最終的に歪みの力にむしばまれることになるのです。これらの現象がより強力になっているという事実は、終わりが近いということの明白な兆しでしょう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Manchmal führt die erste Manifestation eines Psionikers zu dessen Tod und zum Tod vieler anderer. Verfügt ein Psioniker aber über beträchtliche Willenskraft und Disziplin, kann er seinen Fall eine Weile aufschieben. Idira hat schon sehr lange überlebt ... ein lobenswerter Erfolg und ein Ausdruck unglaublichen Glücks – aber früher oder später verschlingen die Mächte des Warps jeden Psioniker, der nicht unter dem Schutz des Imperators steht. Die Tatsache, dass diese Manifestationen mächtiger werden, ist ein eindeutiges Zeichen für das nahende Ende."
languages.original_text: "Sometimes a psyker's first manifestation leads to their death and the deaths of many others. But if a psyker possesses inordinate willpower and discipline, they can stave off their fall for some time. Idira has been alive many years already — a laudable achievement and a stroke of incredibly good fortune — but the forces of the warp will ultimately devour any psyker deprived of the Emperor's protection. The fact that these manifestations are growing more powerful is a clear sign that the end is near."

traits.locale_text: "Manchmal führt die erste Manifestation eines Psionikers zu dessen Tod und zum Tod vieler anderer. Verfügt ein Psioniker aber über beträchtliche Willenskraft und Disziplin, kann er seinen Fall eine Weile aufschieben. Idira hat schon sehr lange überlebt ... ein lobenswerter Erfolg und ein Ausdruck unglaublichen Glücks – aber früher oder später verschlingen die Mächte des Warps jeden Psioniker, der nicht unter dem Schutz des Imperators steht. Die Tatsache, dass diese Manifestationen mächtiger werden, ist ein eindeutiges Zeichen für das nahende Ende."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Il arrive parfois que la première manifestation d'un psyker entraîne sa mort, et celle de bien d'autres victimes. Mais s'il fait preuve d'une volonté et d'une discipline hors du commun, il peut repousser temporairement l'échéance fatidique. Idira a déjà vécu de nombreuses années. Cela seul est en soi un exploit admirable et un coup de chance incroyable, mais les forces du Warp finissent toujours par dévorer les malheureux qui, comme elle, sont privés de la protection de l'Empereur. Le fait que ces manifestations gagnent en puissance est un signe formel. Sa fin est proche. »
languages.original_text: "Sometimes a psyker's first manifestation leads to their death and the deaths of many others. But if a psyker possesses inordinate willpower and discipline, they can stave off their fall for some time. Idira has been alive many years already — a laudable achievement and a stroke of incredibly good fortune — but the forces of the warp will ultimately devour any psyker deprived of the Emperor's protection. The fact that these manifestations are growing more powerful is a clear sign that the end is near."

traits.locale_text: « Il arrive parfois que la première manifestation d'un psyker entraîne sa mort, et celle de bien d'autres victimes. Mais s'il fait preuve d'une volonté et d'une discipline hors du commun, il peut repousser temporairement l'échéance fatidique. Idira a déjà vécu de nombreuses années. Cela seul est en soi un exploit admirable et un coup de chance incroyable, mais les forces du Warp finissent toujours par dévorer les malheureux qui, comme elle, sont privés de la protection de l'Empereur. Le fait que ces manifestations gagnent en puissance est un signe formel. Sa fin est proche. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Bazen bir ruhsezerin ilk tezahürleri, kendisinin ve birçoklarının ölümüne sebep olur. Fakat ruhsezer, ölçüsüz bir iradeye ve disipline sahipse kendi ölümünü bir süreliğine erteleyebilir. İdira zaten uzun yıllardır hayatta. Elbette bu, takdire şayan bir başarı ve inanılmaz bir şans. Gelgelelim öteboyut güçleri, İmparator'un korumasına vakıf olmayan tüm ruhsezerleri eninde sonunda tüketecektir. Bu tezahürlerin gitgide güçlenmesi, sonun yaklaştığını gösteren bariz bir işaret."
languages.original_text: "Sometimes a psyker's first manifestation leads to their death and the deaths of many others. But if a psyker possesses inordinate willpower and discipline, they can stave off their fall for some time. Idira has been alive many years already — a laudable achievement and a stroke of incredibly good fortune — but the forces of the warp will ultimately devour any psyker deprived of the Emperor's protection. The fact that these manifestations are growing more powerful is a clear sign that the end is near."

traits.locale_text: "Bazen bir ruhsezerin ilk tezahürleri kendilerinin ve diğer birçok kişinin ölümüne sebep olur. Fakat ruhsezer ölçüsüz bir iradeye ve disipline sahipse kendi ölümünü bir süreliğine erteleyebilir. İdira zaten uzun yıllardır hayatta. Takdire şayan bir başarı ve inanılmaz bir şans bu tabii ama öteboyut güçleri, İmparator'un korumasına sahip olmayan tüm ruhsezerleri eninde sonunda tüketecektir. Bu tezahürlerin gitgide güçlenmesi, sonun yaklaştığını gösteren bariz bir işaret."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
